类型: Style: Silver BulletsSize: Fits Natural Waist 35-40"
评论详情: After 20 years thought might be time to replace my belt. Planning to start dating & socializing again wanted something fun, not just a functional belt (as 20 yr one works fine for that).  This is not an “everyday wear” type of belt. The metal accents look cool, however can wear, scratch or tear when sliding into car seats, fabric/leather chairs. The extra width of the metal accents also make this belt not fit if belt loops are tight as the metal accents will not have room to slide through the loop. If you are “fluffy” and have skin that might hang over the edge of the belt, also could experience injury/pinching. Be mindful of these potential issues when belts have any sort of accent, especially metal.  The belt itself looks cool & is true to size.

评论概述: Good Fit, With Room For Weight Loss Or Gains. Looks Great! Appropriate Quality.
类型: Style: Silver BulletsSize: Fits Natural Waist 31-36"
评论详情: I ordered this belt in the color/design “Silver Bullets” in the size “Fits Waist 31-36”.” I’m a woman who wanted to wear this belt with low-rise jeans around the part of my hips that measures 35”, and this belt fits there perfectly, notching for a tight fit at the 5th notch in and having 4 more notches available should my hips shrink. Considering the heavy-looking design of this belt, it’s impressively lightweight, even though the “bullets” feel metallic and plenty solid. My guess is that they’re mostly hollow. The buckle is thick and durable, notching easily into any of the perfectly-spaced, easily-penetrated holes.  The bullets are also spaced evenly and symmetrically, and they cannot be slid out of the faux-leather loops containing them. The thickness of this belt’s faux-leather feels about standard for a belt like this, and it does ripple when creased, so any frequent creases will likely cause the outer layer of the material to begin to separate and peel up, as is common with such belts and such a material. I love the look of this belt overall, as it incorporates perfectly into my wardrobe, and I feel that its quality fits the price.

类型: Style: Silver BulletsSize: Fits Natural Waist 31-36"
评论详情: This is a cool little belt. Falling a bit into the punk/metal space, I opted for the bullet belt. It does feel somewhat on the light side, as I suppose it would being made of vinyl or PU or whatever, and the bullets are plastic, but I imagine this is about the quality you would get from the mall subculture store, so no major complaint there. Major complaints on the sizing being like 4-5 inches off. I chose the size I would be in the middle-to-lower end of, so that I might have room to tighten it. Instead, I am at the last loop. Kinda annoying! Size up! Or don't buy it, whichever, I assume these are a dime a dozen.

类型: Style: Black StuddedSize: Fits Natural Waist 27-32"
评论详情: Nice belt but apparently my 15 year old son's waist is thicker than expected. barely fit. But overall nice belts, he likes it and will probably wear it for a little bit

评论概述: Went by size chart...don't do that
类型: Style: Silver StuddedSize: Fits Natural Waist 27-32"
评论详情: I wanted this for a costume. I went off the size chart, but didn't realize they meant natural waist, like high up waist, and I don't know a single soul who has ever worn these high up on their natural waist. Not only that, I figured 32 inches maximum would leave ample room to wear it lower on my hips (my waist is about 27 inches) - it still sits really high up even at the largest hole, more like 29 inches max. I would suggest sizing up if you want to wear it lower around your waist because they maximum length is not accurate for the available holes. It will be fine for my costume ultimately (or I'll find someone smaller who can wear it), but the quality is pretty cheap (fake leather) and it is very stiff and "fresh out the factory" feeling. Definitely only good for a costume - would not recommend as a daily wear item due to the obvious cheapness of the materials. Thankfully all studs were present and accounted for at least!

类型: Style: Silver BulletsSize: Fits Natural Waist 27-32"
评论详情: This stylish belt with an ammunition clip theme not only looks great but also has realistic bullets sown on, giving a very biker, or Armed Forces vibe. It was the person sided belt for my height and weight. Excellent

类型: Style: Silver BulletsSize: Fits Natural Waist 31-36"
评论详情: I picked this up for to use as part of a costume. The quality is pretty good because its not really made to be a costume belt. While it has lots of belt holes I will say that if you wear anything over a size 34 in the waist this belt will not fit. Overall I really like it.

类型: Style: Silver StuddedSize: Fits Natural Waist 31-36"
评论详情: I stupidly got rid of a lot of my rocker style clothes when I became a dad and quit being in metal bands. Recently, I realized I dont really feel like me when I go out most places, and started dressing how I always had. One problem was that I lost a bit of weight and needed a belt, and my "dress" belts weren't going to cut it. I found this and the price was perfect so I ordered it. Its great. It is the look I wanted, the quality is great and the price is low enough that I'm not concerned with being rough with it, since it will get worn almost every day. Super happy with my purchase.

类型: Style: Black StuddedSize: Fits Natural Waist 35-40"
评论详情: This is more or less what you would expect. It's a nice-looking pyramid studded belt made of sturdy fake leather. It has single holes with grommets, fits the waist size specified in the listing, and the black coating on the pyramid studs stayed through a couple of days of regular use (so far). If you are someone looking at a belt of this kind, I think you would be happy with this one, unless you are very particular about what it is made of. It looks cool, and holds your pants up. If I had one quibble, it would be that I would have maybe put one more pyramid stud on the loop for the extra length of belt, but it looks fine as is, as well.

类型: Style: Black StuddedSize: Fits Natural Waist 35-40"
评论详情: I like wider belts, and got it because I liked the black on black color scheme and the studs. Unfortunately, I calculated the size incorrectly (I should've gotten 31-36") so it's too big for me to use. Alas, I really like how it looks :/

类型: Style: Silver BulletsSize: Fits Natural Waist 31-36"
评论详情: Arrived quickly and in good condition.  We ordered this bullet studded belt for our grandson and he loved it immediately.  Well made, this belt could easily go for a lot more, but at eighteen bucks, it's a great buy.  Can fit many different occasions, such as going out to a club, casual hanging out, or having dinner with friends.  This belt is a trendy fashion statement, designed for those who like to stand out. Pair with jeans, dark pants, or even shorts for that cool look.
